title: Will Taric get a new skin when his update comes out?
body: I feel like he should get a new skin

replies.body: I don't think there are plans for any brand new skins when his update comes out, but I do think the plan is to re-imagine the existing ones. For example, Emerald Taric won't just feel like "Green Taric," and Fifth Age won't just feel like "Pink Taric" (though it will still be outrageous).
